Job ID: PK-1029430
Description:
 
 
SUMMARY:
Health Care Service Corporation, a Mutual Legal Reserve Company (HCSC), and an 
Independent Licensee of the Blue Cross and Blue Shield Association, is the largest customer-
owned health insurer in the United States and fourth largest overall, operating through our Blue 
Cross and Blue Shield® Plans in Illinois, Montana, New Mexico, Oklahoma and Texas. HCSC 
affiliates and subsidiaries such as Dearborn National® and Medecision offer group life, disability 
and dental solutions, as well as a range of other individual solutions.
HCSC is transitioning to Oracle ERP Cloud platform and is looking for professionals who can be 
a part of the Finance Systems Innovation organization.  The individual must have experience 
with implementing or supporting Oracle ERP cloud or Oracle E-Business Suite.  The individual 
will be responsible for providing functional support across several cloud modules such as; 
General Ledger, Allocations, Accounts Payable, Project Costing, Asset Management and 
Procurement and is expected to be the primary liaison between business and technical teams. 
This leader will be a finance thought partner in FSD’s transformation efforts through continuous 
improvement of business processes and focus on operational efficiencies. 
BASIC FUNCTION:
*	Responsible for providing functional support of Oracle Cloud financial applications and 
serve as the primary liaison between business and technical teams
*	Consult and participate in Cloud upgrade releases and new projects involving strategy, 
implementation and support
*	Assess impact of patches on training, interfaces, processes, documentation, etc. Make 
recommendations for adoption of new or changed functionality
*	Work directly with business stakeholders to resolve help desk issues and vendor service 
requests
*	Create and maintain existing documentation (Configuration, test scripts, functional specs 
for reporting and integration)
*	Assist with continuous process improvement and provide insights into best practices
*	Provide assistance in key system processes (i.e. process of month-end, quarter-end and 
year-end close processes)
*	Assist with functional testing of monthly, quarterly and emergency patches
*	Assist in training support
 JOB REQUIREMENTS:
*	Bachelor’s degree in Finance, Accounting, Business, or other related field from an 
accredited college/university AND 6 years of experience in supporting functional 
financial systems in finance, accounting industry.
*	4 years of functional support of Oracle Cloud or E-Business Suite financial applications.
*	Detailed understanding of financial business processes. Experience with supporting one 
or more of the following processes: General Ledger, Procurement, Accounts Payable, 
Project Costing, Fixed Assets, Planning and Budgeting, and Allocations.
*	Experience with Cloud release upgrade process; Ability to perform and lead business 
process impact analysis while working collaboratively with key business stakeholders
*	Experience with monthly and quarterly patch testing/issue resolution, performing impact 
analysis and testing.
*	Demonstrated experience as a senior resource assisting in the definition of systems 
strategy, gathering and documenting business requirements, leading fit-gap analysis, as-is 
and to-be business process designs, prototype functional configuration, testing, user 
training
*	Strong oral and written communication skills, including presentation skills (MS Visio, 
MS PowerPoint)
*	Strong analytical skills with the ability to collect, organize, analyze, and disseminate 
significant amounts of information with attention to detail and accuracy; Ability to solve 
problems involving remote and elusive symptoms often spanning multiple business 
areas/functions
*	A solid understanding of how people go through a change and the change process
*	Strong problem solving and troubleshooting skills with the ability to exercise mature 
judgment
*	Proven ability to build, manage and foster a team-oriented environment
*	Applicants must be currently authorized to work in the United States without the need for 
visa sponsorship now or in the future
 PREFERRED JOB REQUIREMENTS:
*	Consulting experience with top-tier consulting firm
*	Experience leading an entire work stream of relevant Cloud applications
*	Ability to work independently and manage multiple task assignments
*	Eagerness to mentor work colleagues
